dotfiles.setup:
FILES_I_NEED=".aliases .bash_aliases .bash_profile .bashrc .git .gitconfig .gitignore .oh-my-zsh .oh-my-zsh/ .git .shell_common .ssh .tmux.conf .zshrc .zshrc.pre-oh-my-zsh "

for f in $FILES_I_NEED
do
ln -nfs ~/dotfiles/$i ~/$i
done

cd dotfiles
git submodule init
git submodule update
